reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Stern was great and easy to talk to.  Felt very comfortable and in good hands.
Dr Stern is friendly, interesting and a great listener. More importantly she is a great cardiologist who takes the time to explain your testing/evaluation and answer any questions.
I absolutely LOVED Dr. Stern. She has a great bedside manner and responded with my test results in record time. I feel my heart health is taken care with Dr. Stern as my health partner.
She was very knowledgeable, friendly and efficient.  I would highly recommend her and her entire office.
Dr. Stern is very smart and thoughtful and takes time speaking to her patients and explaining everything. She is a great doctor!
Dr. Stern is very attentive and caring and takes the time to explain your health situation in detail. She is friendly and easy to talk to and answers all of your questions.
She is an expert in her field yet she’s very approachable and attentive.  She has been my physician for more than 25 years.   She is amazing.
Dr. Stern listens, is thoughtful about me as an individual and considers my needs.
she listens.  addresses concerns.  friendly.

reviewDetails.comment: Large, well staffed, and organized retinology practice of two MDs.  Knowledgeable and personable.

Dr Charles is very nice person and honest guy and friendly.
Thank you Dr Charles you are the best .I will never forget you.
[PERSONAL INFO]
I have had significant issues with my eyes. Dr. Charles has been terrific. Very good outcome and a terrific manor about him. I would highly recommend him.
Dr. Charles provided great insight to my ailment and took care of my surgical needs.
Dr Charles is very thorough in his diagnosis and care of his patients
I felt the office was very efficient and very well organized in set up and timing - allowing for eye drops to take affect and pre-doctor visit tasks were really done right

I have been seeing Dr. Charles for 25 years now. He had operated on my eye in 2009 when I had rental detachment.
The eye sight was restored an I am very grateful to him. I go for a checkup every 6 months and he does a thorough job. 
Thanks

reviewDetails.comment:
Dr  Powel was very professional and thorough.
He answered my questions completely.
I have been seeing Dr Powell for almost 20 years I think - he is very amenable adds valuable input to my diabetes management and its been a good relationship
Dr. Powell is very knowledgeable. He spends time with his patients. Explains lab work in detail. Always courteous and happy to see ya.

Dr Powell is excellent!  He spends a lot  of time with his patients.  Listens well and addresses any issues immediately.  He is also extremely accessible personally or via his nurse Dawn.   Very pleasant and personable as well.  Highly recommended.
He is very knowledgeable and always takes the time to discuss my health with me.

Dr Powell was very thorough and spent a lot of time asking me about my general health, symptoms and supplements. I feel very confident in his medical recommendations and would highly recommend dr Powell to anyone needing an endocrinologist.
He’s very professional, spends time with, shows he care and explain the illness and how to care for the illness.

DR. Powell takes his time with his patients is caring and understanding. He takes the time to listen and is very knowledgeable about what is going on with me by aquatinting himself with my full medical history and visits to my other doctors.
He is very knowledgeable , explains everything and spends quality time with me at every visit

Highly recommend!!!
Dr. Howard is courteous and understanding and a very good listener I would highly recommend them to anybody that is looking for a primary care physician

Excellent, respectable and very knowledgeable. Great bedside manner.
